string-array.name: baths
string-array.item: In the territory of Banya Bashi Mosque and the mineral water sources in the downtown found have been Roman baths and a temple dedicated to the gods of medicine Aesculapius, Hygeia, and Apollo the Healer. An interesting statue of Apollo the Healer with a stick around which is wrapped a snake - an attribute considered the embodiment of his healing power is found at the site.
Address: Sofia, Banski Sq. (Click to see on the map)
